text: Inhein dekho to inke jussey(jism/bodies) tumhein badey shaandaar nazar aayein bolein to tum inki batein sunte reh jao, magar asal mein yeh goya lakhdi ke kunde hain(beams of timber) jo deewar ke saath chun kar rakh diye gaye hon. Har zoar ki aawaz ko yeh apne khilaf samajhte hain. Yeh pakke dushman hain insey bachh kar raho. Allah ki maar inpar yeh kidhar ultey phiraye ja rahe hain
